item.title: How to make cluescroll open a message *read for more detail explanation*
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

open a interface, such as…

public void customInterface(){ //grey patterned interface clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 3024);//Close Text sendQuest("", 3026);//Line 1 sendQuest("", 3027);//Line 2 sendQuest("", 3028);//Line 3 sendQuest("", 3029);//Line 4 sendQuest("", 3030);//Line 5 sendQuest("", 3031);//Line 6 sendQuest("", 3032);//Line 7 sendQuest("", 3033);//Line 8 sendQuest("", 3034);//Line 9 sendQuest("", 3035);//Line 10 sendQuest("", 3036);//Line 11 sendQuest("", 3037);//Line 12 showInterface(3023); flushOutStream();

and thats to make it show your words, but to get the interface you can search the tutorials.

Read full topic
